list._comment_word_native_transliteration: Native transliteration field contains phonetic representations of the English word 'word' in multiple native language scripts. This is a JSON object with locale keys (bn=Bengali, hi=Hindi, es=Spanish) where each value shows how the English word sounds when written in that native script. Used for pronunciation guidance.
